name: OR_LNLG_LASER_TISS
description: This table contains information about patient tissue protection for procedures involving lasers.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LSC_TISSUE_PROT_C_NAME
columns.description: The tissue protection category number for the laser safety checklist.
